channel.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again
channel.description:
Well, after the 1.5 update I downloaded the 1.5 client by CoonHunter on the Offical server thread and I tried logging in and it just told me this: Disconnected by Server
Took to lo (yes it's cut off)
I was asking badger for help, and he didn't know. If you could please tell me what the problem is and how to fix it that would be great. If I'm banned, tell me what I did.
Any help is appriciated, Thanks.

item.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

It appears MITB’s 6 hour restarted script has broken or the server broke as soon as the server restarted.

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:10, topic:395481”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=492678.msg3604730#msg3604730 date=1305998077]

weird, im getting an error where it is stuck on “logging in” and then says end of stream…

it was fine last night. i havent changed anything O.o

the minecraft server is very unstable with a shitton of problems like this one its happened before we just need moparisthebest to restart it(i hope)
[/quote]Why didn’t the autorestarter fix it…[/quote]

i dont know everything i dont have access to the server itself but i think mopar restarts it himself

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again
item.dc:creator: @bennu bennu
item.description:
@bennu wrote:

Hi, I have also problems with the logo, but rather with the connection.
I’ve been trying to connect all day but I couldnt, I get the message ‘End of Stream’, it happens to all or only me?, I can connect to other servers without problems.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

The error is that it “took too long” to login. I think this is caused by something blocking the port, therefore preventing you to login, make sure your firewall or any antivirus software is off, then try again.

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again

item.description:

Somebody please fix this.

item.title: Having trouble logging in.. Again
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:2, topic:395481”]client 1.5_01?

if u were ban it would say that u are ban.[/quote]

He is ipbanned somehow, it just tells him that it takes too long to connect.

And he hasnt done anything wrong.
